title: Hacked, got account back, charged back by hacker and now Account is banned. Tournament tomorrow
body:
Heya
title sums it up.
A friend of mine is going through this and any help would be appreciated.

Account got hacked, hacker spent RP, account back to original owner, hacker charged RP back, account is now banned. A tournament is on for 10am tomorrow and my friend cannot play without their account.

Cheers.

replies.body:
Please have your friend go through the steps in this article:
> https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334-Chargebacks#h3

Once he's paid, let me know!
